description.displayText: It is our pleasure to recommend Sally as a childcare professional. She cared for our boy/girl twins from 4 months old to 21 months. Sally is bright, responsible, and affectionate. She truly has a natural affinity toward children; our twins  faces simply lit up when she entered the room. When Sally started with our family, she had ample childcare experience but not with twins. We were impressed with how quickly she adapted and partnered with us in keeping them on the same schedule and expertly navigating the transition from infancy to toddlerhood. Our twins thrived in Sally's care. She worked tirelessly to help our children reach their developmental milestones, from physical skills like sitting and walking, to actively encouraging their lingual skills. Music and dance, reading and coloring, were all daily activities in our household. We feel fortunate to have had Sally in our home and have no doubt that she will be an asset to the next family with which she works.

description.displayText: We met with Sally and spoke with several of her references - she is the real deal and a true professional with lots of experience.  Unfortunately we had some issues with scheduling in the coming months - but whatever family ends up with her will be a lucky one.
description.originalText: We met with Sally and spoke with several of her references - she is the real deal and a true professional with lots of experience.  Unfortunately we had some issues with scheduling in the coming months - but whatever family ends up with her will be a lucky one.

description.displayText: Sally worked for us for approximately 6 years and I cannot say enough wonderful things about her.  She is kind, trustworthy, responsible, loving, thoughtful and sensitive.  She took amazing care of our daughter and we are forever grateful to her for being part of our family.  I am happy to speak with any potential employers to give a personal reference over the phone.
